Row.Text: Shall I teach you about knowledge? What you know, you know, what you don't know, you don't know. This is true knowledge.
Have you come to me, Kong Fu Zi, seeking knowledge? That already is knowledge.
Have you come to me, Kong Fu Zi, seeking knowledge? That already is knowledge.
Have you come to me, Kong Fu Zi, seeking knowledge? That already is knowledge.
One must know when one can fight. And now we can.
Heaven is against you; you shall see.
Death! What a blessing! The righteous man can rest, and villains' tricks end.
